projects.name: Twitter Video Downloader
projects.description: Solved a real-world problem of downloading twitter video streams, created a bot which replies to user by providing them a downloadable link.Furtherly, shorten the long form of cloud url using Python, Django and GraphQL

projects.name: Secure pad: Collaborative Text Editor
projects.description: Built a real-time collaborative rich text editor powered by a blockchain  with latency of 0.5 sec for each operation to multiple peers on the network.

projects.name: X-Ray Vison (Deep Learning Approach
projects.description: Pre trained VGGNet-16 CNN  model via fine tuning with SGD optimizer for the classification of Normal vs Opacity vs Cardiomegaly.

projects.name: Memory Management in C/C++
projects.description: Implemented a custom malloc function with srbk() system call and Linked List Data Structure.Further, implemented paging and segmentation memory managements schemes.
